remarks: Cancellation law for trace-perserving endomorphism values (used as scalar product).  (Contributed by NM, 7-Apr-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
tendospcan.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
tendospcan.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
tendospcan.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
tendospcan.e $e |- E = ( ( TEndo ` K ) ` W ) $.
tendospcan.o $e |- O = ( f e. T |-> ( _I |` B ) ) $.
tendospcanN $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( S e. E /\ S =/= O ) /\ ( F e. T /\ G e. T ) ) -> ( ( S ` F ) = ( S ` G ) <-> F = G ) ) $.
$d B f $.
$d T f $.
